title: Kreuzberg
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee house with a food menu, while primarily meat, also includes a few vegan food items: 1 sandwich, 1 salad, 1 entree. Soups are vegetarian and often vegan. Try the Milan Kundera which is a sandwich consisting of crispy tofu, sweet chili glaze, slaw, micro-greens & sunflower seeds on ciabatta bread. Verve brand coffee. Large interior, informal seating, order at the counter.
